item.title: Meet five new species discovered in 2025
item.description: A bumpy snailfish, Andean mouse opossum and ancient sea cow were just some of the many species described in 2025.

item.title: ‘Swipe, Swipe’: New Yorkers Give the MetroCard a Public Funeral
item.description: There were few tears at a funeral for the MetroCard, which included chants of “swipe, swipe” and an urn.

item.title: Thieves Make Off With Millions in German Bank Heist
item.description: The robbers stole valuables with an insured value of at least $36 million from a bank in Gelsenkirchen, western Germany.
